subtitle: Backend Developer
aboutText:
Hello

I’m a developer passionate about technology and fascinated by the world of software development. With over 4 years of experience, I have been creating personal projects and continuously improving my skills, with a special focus on back-end development.

Here, you can explore some of the projects I have developed and the ones I’m currently working on. Are you here out of curiosity or because I shared this with you? Either way, feel free to explore!

Additionally, right below, you’ll find the technologies I work with and improve my skills in daily.
projectsDescription: Here are some of the projects I’ve developed.
projectDesc1: WhatsApp bot to track packages built with Node.js and the Baileys library.
projectDesc2: API built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Simple authentication system, front-end integration, and future documentation.
projectDesc3: Web API in C# (ASP.NET Core) to manage people’s information with CRUD operations and MySQL database.
skillsDescription: Technologies and tools I work with.
getTouchDescription: Feel free to reach out for collaborations or just to say a friendly hello.
